channel.title: Kicksecure on distrowatch
channel.description: When I recommended Kicksecure in various chats, people often wrote "I can't find this distro on distrowatch. Did you send a scam?" I was even blocked for this once :grin: I wrote to Jesse Smith and asked him to add Kicksecure to distrowatch. He did it! https://distrowatch.com/table.php?distribution=kicksecure

item.title: Kicksecure on distrowatch
item.dc:creator: sam
item.description:
When I recommended Kicksecure in various chats, people often wrote “I can’t find this distro on distrowatch. Did you send a scam?” I was even blocked for this once
I wrote to Jesse Smith and asked him to add Kicksecure to distrowatch. He did it!

distrowatch.com
